titlestmt.titleproper: BU Records: Communications/Media Committee, Inclusive: 1981-1987, undated

note.p: Â© 2021 The Texas Collection. All rights reserved.

profiledesc.creation: Finding Aid was generated by The Texas Collection staff, using the STAR Knowledge Center for Archives (SKCA) task that automatically creates EAD files from the Archive's SKCA catalog records.

did.head: Records Summary
did.abstract: BU Records: Communications/Media Committee consists of memos, letters, proposals, publications, and a campus guide from Baylor University's Communications Media Committee.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: Baylor University's Communications/Media Committee is a university committee that reviews publication and non-print media proposals submitted by individuals and organizations to assure compliance with University publication guidelines and to provide quality control. There are twelve faculty members and one student representative on the committee. The committee reports to the Vice President for University Relations and the Associate Vice President for External Relations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection begins in 1981 and ends in 1987, with one folder of undated materials. The collection contains correspondence and documents relating to the committee's meetings as well as submitted proposals of publications and non-print media.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Prior to current processing, this collection was arranged in somewhat alphabetical order in labeled folders. Currently, the collection is arranged in two series: I. Correspondence and II. Literary Productions. Within each series and each folder, materials were kept in original order.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: All requests for copying of materials must be submitted to The Texas Collection in writing. Please use the Request Form for Copying Materials sheet. Unpublished materials authored or otherwise produced by the creator (s) of this collection are in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

userestrict.head: Use/Re-use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: BU Records: Communications/Media Committee, Accession #BU/291, Box #, Folder #, The Texas Collection, Baylor University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Described by Leanna Barcelona. Released on 2020-02-13.

bibref.extref: "Communications/Media Committee." University Committees, Baylor University. Accessed 2020 January 30.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series included memos regarding meetings and correspondence regarding committee work. This series is in good condition.

bioghist.head: Biography/Profile
bioghist.p: This series includes proposals and publications submitted to the committee for review. This series is in good condition.
